title: foobar 2000 1.3.1 +extensions+ instructions

Instructions:
Simply install foobar2000_v1.3.1 and look up your media in it

for controlling the play/pause/forward/rewind from your keyboard like on wmp for
instance install: foo_AdvancedControls

for tagging straight from discogs.com(where I got all my Vinyl Photos from...LOL)
Install:foo_discogs

for opening and mounting SACD's Install: foo_input_sacd

the contents in the /Equalizers folder should be opened when loading presets from 
the equalizer included within the software

I really recommand this software for mounting any .cue file that usually don't 
open on Daemon Tools which I used to think were malware beforehand...

Enjoy
sidmal
